title: Energy - Comparing energy dissipated by friction

content.question: Which of the following claims about the mechanical energy dissipated during intervals <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> and <math alttext="4" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn></math> is true?

choices.label: <math alttext="the absolute value of delta E sub 4 is greater than the absolute value of delta E sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of delta E sub 2 is greater than the absolute value of delta E sub 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of delta E sub 2 equals the absolute value of delta E sub 4, which is greater than 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of delta E sub 2 equals the absolute value of delta E sub 4, which equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the absolute value of delta E sub 2 is greater than the absolute value of delta E sub 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
